Keyboard shortcuts for Audacity

A visual cheat-sheet for the 135 default keyboard shortcuts found in Audacity

Original Reference Report Issue

File Menu

New

  • Ctrl
  • N

Open

  • Ctrl
  • O

Close

  • W

  • Q

  • S

  • L

  • Shift
  • I
